front.title: Redesignation of 240/4 from 'Future Use" to "Limited Use for Large Private Internets'

abstract.t: This document directs the IANA to designate the block of IPv4 addresses from 240.0.0.0 to 255.255.255.255 (240.0.0.0/4) as unicast address space for limited use in large private Internets.
